ingredients: 10 Tbs. (1 1⁄4 sticks) cold unsalted butter, cut into 1⁄2-inch pieces
1⁄2 cup frozen vegetable shortening, cut into 1⁄2-inch pieces
5 Granny Smith apples, peeled, cored and cut into 1⁄2-inch chunks
3⁄4 cup firmly packed light brown sugar
2 Tbs. unsalted butter, cut into small pieces
Cheddar cheese or vanilla ice cream for serving (optional)
